description.plain: Hello everyone my name is Lexi! I’m 19 and my favorite thing is to express my feelings through my music. I’ve been writing and singing since I can remember and it’s always been such a huge part of my life. 2021 was a crazy year for me, I signed with a label, released my first EP, and went on tour. But my life took a twist in August when I went through a really tough breakup (my first love). The last few months I spent every day in the studio writing about what I’ve been going through and tbh writing these songs was therapy for me and was the reason I was able to get through the pain. But as hard as my situation was, I believe this happened to me so I could be a voice for those who may be going through something similar. I feel so lucky that I get to express myself through my music and put it out into the world. Anyway, this next project is the best music I’ve ever made! It’s raw, real, honest, vulnerable, and tells my story. I’m so excited for you all to hear it. I could SCREAM!!! Thank you to each and every one of you for being a part of my journey. xo
